title: (x) Forget what you know - Cam {Ignacio, Patricia}
content:
This one could be [Cam Bold and Cam Extrabold Oblique](http://web.archive.org/web/20050516143545/http:/youworkforthem.com/product.php?sku=T0005), if you download the hi-res preview (scroll down) will have a better view.   
   
[Moderator edit] I moved Ignacio's ID from the duplicate thread to this one.
author: Ignacio

comments.content:
This could be Cam Oblique too - with the O's etc filled in.   
   
 [http://youworkforthem.com/product.php?sku=T0005](http://web.archive.org/web/20050516143545/http:/youworkforthem.com/product.php?sku=T0005)   
   
(Franz should take credit for this)
OK, I see Ignacio ID'd this one in another thread on the same query.
Yes, these double posts are a bummer.
Patricia, do you know the secret about double posts?
No... I don't know the secret. Are you gonna clue me in?

Wanda, when you make a post about half the time you recieve an error message. Don't post again, just go back one page and go to topics and you will see your name listed as the latest post. It works believe me
